subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On his 77th birthday, George Steinbrenner, the Yankees’ real Yankee Doodle Dandy, wasn’t feeling dandy, but this season he should be accustomed to that feeling.
snippet: On his 77th birthday, George Steinbrenner, the Yankees’ real Yankee Doodle Dandy, wasn’t feeling dandy, but this season he should be accustomed to that feeling.
